text:
Hello! Is it possible to retrieve the labels/values for a HubSpot CRM property via HubL? For example I have a dropdown property with the ID 'job_title' and I want to output the labels on a page.

I know I could create a custom field for this and populate the values there, but I'm trying to avoid the duplication of data entry for bigger properties (e.g. country selection)

I don't know why this is giving me trouble, but I'm using a Page Field in the design manager and it's only giving me the ID. I need to get the page slug. I know I can use `content_by_id()` to get that, but there is a limit on how many times you can use that on one page, so I'm not able to get what I want. Is there an easy way around this limitation?
